channel.title: CVE Feed for Tyche Softwares -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tyche Softwares -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-4233|2024-05-08T13:19:59.655Z -- Tyche Softwares -- Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Tyche Softwares Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce, Tyche Softwares Arconix Shortcodes, Tyche Softwares Arconix FAQ.This issue affects Print Invoice & Delivery Notes for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.8.1; Arconix Shortcodes: from n/a through 2.1.10; Arconix FAQ: from n/a through 1.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32434|2024-04-15T08:10:31.570Z -- Tyche Softwares -- Order Delivery Date for WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tyche Softwares Order Delivery Date for WooCommerce.This issue affects Order Delivery Date for WooCommerce: from n/a through 3.20.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-33585|2024-04-29T12:43:51.179Z -- Tyche Softwares -- Payment Gateway Based Fees and Discounts for WooCommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Tyche Softwares Payment Gateway Based Fees and Discounts for WooCommerce.This issue affects Payment Gateway Based Fees and Discounts for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.12.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-31920|2024-04-15T09:27:55.087Z -- Tyche Softwares -- Currency per Product for WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tyche Softwares Currency per Product for WooCommerce.This issue affects Currency per Product for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.6.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31431|2024-04-15T09:31:56.473Z -- Tyche Softwares -- Product Input Fields for WooCommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tyche Softwares Product Input Fields for WooCommerce.This issue affects Product Input Fields for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.7.0.
